backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of key frontend files.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Documentation describing how to configure a custom domain for an Internet Computer deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/public/404.html: Fallback redirect page sending all unknown routes back to the root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and rendering them.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive navigation header with logo, desktop links, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing academy branding, description, and clickable site URL.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Shared layout composing header, outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralized content config storing hero text, leadership, courses, benefits, and site URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor linked to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub hook returning no backend queries for this static site.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, approach, and reasons to choose the academy.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders contact information and a form that opens an email draft on submit.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for each course including overview, audience, and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section, leadership info, and course previews.
frontend/src/pages/TutorsPage.tsx: Renders the Tutors page, mapping tutor data from siteContent into styled profile cards with placeholder notices.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s current state, goals, features, and architectural notes for rebuilding and deploying the academy website.
